thread.title: Study forecasts big health benefits from Ohio energy standards
thread.title_full: Study forecasts big health benefits from Ohio energy standards

title: Study forecasts big health benefits from Ohio energy standards
text:
23 Study forecasts big health benefits from Ohio energy standards 
Midwest Energy News: Resuming Ohio’s clean energy standards could bring big health benefits, according to an analysis released last week by environmental advocates.On the flip side, the report’s authors note, continuing the current freeze could turn those potential benefits into added costs.
